===Overview===
The '''Boston Red Sox''' are an American professional baseball team based in [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts (State)|Massachusetts]]. The Red Sox compete in Major League Baseball, The Red Sox' home ballpark has been [[Fenway Park]] since 1912.
